name: macho-brace
effect: Held : When the holder would gain effort due to battle, it gains double that effort instead. Held in battle : Holder has half its Speed.
short_effect: Held: Holder gains double effort values from battles, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stiff and heavy brace that promotes strong growth but lowers Speed.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stiff and heavy brace that promotes strong growth but lowers Speed.
